lab: Project and System Engineering and Management - II
lab_display_name: Project and System Engineering and Management - II
introduction:
Welcome to the Project and System Engineering and Management - II lab developed at COEPTECH. This laboratory focuses on the project engineering processes—both pre-engineering and post-engineering—typically handled by instrumentation engineers during plant commissioning. The lab emphasises key aspects such as sensor selection, calibration, installation procedures, and the precautions necessary when deploying sensors in real-world environments.
It reflects the typical responsibilities of an instrumentation engineer, particularly those involved in consultancy roles. The documentation covered includes P&ID diagrams, instrument index sheets, specification sheets, hook-up diagrams, pre-commissioning records, and maintenance documentation. Designed to strengthen the engineering skills necessary for efficient project execution, this lab provides valuable training for students entering the field. The sensor calibration lab setup replicates a real-world calibration facility, ensuring accurate and realistic simulations.

experiments.name: Design and develop a P & ID for Flow sensors calibration set-up
Design and develop a P & ID for Level sensors calibration set-up
Design and develop a P & ID for Pressure and Vacuum sensors calibration set-up
Design and develop a P & ID for Temperature sensors calibration set-up
Develop Specification sheets for given instruments for a calibration lab
Develop Hook up drawings (Control valve, Thermowell, orifice plate, DPT, etc)

UG: UG (3rd Year) 6th Semester, UG (4th Year), 7th Semester

objective:
• Understand various sensors and their installation and calibration requirements
  • Develop various documents required to complete the project
  • Identify the importance of documents and their interrelations
  • Develop the skill of working in a team to complete the project within specified limits
  • Apply national and international standards and recommended practices

courseAlignment.description: The syllabi of this lab aligns to the following universities in India.
universities: Savitribai Phule Pune University, Pune, Maharashtra
Sant Gadge Baba Amravati University, Amravati, Maharashtra
Kavyitri Bahinabai North Maharashtra University, Jalgaon, Maharashtra
Swami Ramanand Teerth Marathwada University, Nanded, Maharashtra
